Title: Trail Blazers' Damian Lillard: Posts 25 points, 13 dimes
Description: Lillard recorded 25 points (9-21 FG, 4-11 3Pt, 3-3 FT), 13 assists and seven rebounds across 35 minutes during Tuesday's 111-106 loss to the Nuggets. Lillard continues to thrive for the Blazers with CJ McCollum (foot) and Jusuf Nurkic (wrist) out,
Author: CBSSports.com
